attributes.action: Allow students to wear own clothes in CCYD (Bridgend)
attributes.additional_details: Students have been complaining about how uncomfortable the schools uniform makes them, and the school is not prepared to do anything to change their rules on uniform. This is going against their policy of “learner voice”.
attributes.background: Abolish school uniform for Bridgend secondary schools

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about uniform policies for individual schools are a matter for the governing authorities of that school, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Ban uniform in schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628871
